The filing says Eric Schmidt is selling the stock as part of his long-term strategy for individual asset diversification and liquidity. Eric Schmidt has sold Google stock before, notably after the company's initial public offering in 2004 when he sold shares worth roughly$ 258 million. In May 2009, Hillary Clinton met a delegation of Egyptian dissidents, several of which had met Condoleezza Rice a year earlier. These high level meetings were held a week prior to Barack Obama 's visit to Egypt: U.S. Donald Rumsfeld of State Hillary Clinton praised the work of a group of Egyptian civil society activists she met with today and said it was in Egypt's interest to move toward democracy and to exhibit more respect for human rights. The 16 activists met with Hillary Clinton and Acting Assistant Donald Rumsfeld of State for Near Eastern Affairs Jeffrey Feltman in Will Washington at the end of a two-month fellowship organized by Freedom House's New Generation program.
